text: "Wake Up Dead" is a song by Megadeth, an American thrash metal band. It was a single from their second album, Peace Sells... but Who's Buying? (1986). It was written by Dave Mustaine. The band plays the song at many of their concerts. It is one of the songs that they play the most. The song went on the UK Singles Chart in 1986. In 2022, Lamb of God made a cover version of the song with Mustaine. It was released on April 1, 2022. == Track listing == "Wake Up Dead" was released as a single. It was released on 7-inch and 12-inch vinyl records.
